Title: Tremors: A Cold Day in Hell
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: John Whelpley, Brent Maddock (based on characters created by), S.S. Wilson (based on the character created by), Ron Underwood (based on characters created by)
Actors: Jay Anstey, Alistair Moulton Black, Paul du Toit, Michael Gross
Plot: The new sequel finds Burt Gummer, who's dying from Graboid poison, and his son Travis at a remote research station in Canada's Nunavut Territory, where they must go up against a new batch of Graboids to save Burt's life.
